titles.title: Arakawa Tensei: Arakawa Hiromu ga Isekai Tensei Shitara Nouka no Chishiki de Musou Shite Gachi no Kizoku ni Nacchatta Ken
Arakawa Tensei: That Time Arakawa Hiromu Reincarnated in Another World and, Using Her Knowledge of Farming, Became Unrivaled and Turned Into a Real-Ass Noble
荒川転生 ~荒川弘が異世界転生したら農家の知識で無双してガチの貴族になっちゃった件~
